ezvcard.util

Class Utf8Writer

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.Writer
      • java.io.OutputStreamWriter
        • ezvcard.util.Utf8Writer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, Flushable, Appendable, AutoCloseable

    public class Utf8Writer
extends OutputStreamWriter
    Writes characters that are UTF-8 encoded.
    Author:
    Michael Angstadt

      • Utf8Writer

        public Utf8Writer(OutputStream out)
        Creates a new UTF-8 writer.

      • Utf8Writer

        public Utf8Writer(File file)
           throws FileNotFoundException
        Creates a new UTF-8 writer.
        Parameters:
        file - the file to write to
        Throws:
        FileNotFoundException - if the file cannot be written to

      • Utf8Writer

        public Utf8Writer(File file,
                  boolean append)
           throws FileNotFoundException
        Creates a new UTF-8 writer.
        Parameters:
        file - the file to write to
        append - true to append to the file, false to overwrite it (this parameter has no effect if the file does not exist)
        Throws:
        FileNotFoundException - if the file cannot be written to
